questions.explanation:
London Arena.

	The concert was filmed on 15th February, 2002, at London Arena, London, England. During filming, there were over 30 cameras used for a spectacular show from all angles.

questions.text: Which song appeared on the bonus disc twice in two forms?
questions.explanation:
Wait and Bleed.

	"Wait and Bleed" appeared in its original form, and a new and improved 'animated' version.

questions.text: On the "Maggots Edits" bonus feature, which member had a camera on the neck his guitar, facing down the fretboard?
questions.explanation:
Mick& Mick Thompson&Thompson.

	All the Slipknot members had a different camera angle, but this one was the most spectacular, in my opinion.

questions.text: During the main concert, the band played "Left Behind". If you select the VIP option, lyrics appear at the bottom of the screen. What was the first set that appeared?
questions.correct: I cannot stand to see your thalidomide robot face
options: I've known faces that have disappeared in time
I've seen this and wondered what I've done to calcify
All my friends have pictures to make you cry
questions.explanation:
I cannot stand to see your thalidomide robot face.

	The next line that appears, is "Just to infiltrate me, I'm still drowning."

questions.text: What is the last song played during the concert?
questions.explanation:
Surfacing.

	There were 15 songs played during this concert, including all of the above named, and others like "(sic)", "Purity", and "The Heretic Anthem".

questions.text: Joey played a drum solo after which song?
questions.explanation:
Eyeless.

	It was an amazing sight to see, with an impressive light display, and a rotating drumkit.

questions.text: On the bonus disc, which track features as an audio only song?
questions.explanation:
Purity.

	"Purity" also appears on the live concert in all its splendour.

questions.text: Which of the following did NOT appear during the concert?
questions.explanation:
Prosthetics.

	"Prosthetics" is on the "Slipknot" album though.

questions.text: Which of these directed the concert?
questions.explanation:
Matthew Amos.

	The only other Amos directed piece, was "On Tour" which was released in 1997, and featured Sting and Steve Earle.

questions.text: The song "Disasterpiece" is taken from which Slipknot album?
questions.explanation:
Iowa.

	"Iowa" was released in 2001, as a tribute to the bands home town of Des Moines, Iowa, USA.
